$
$
$
HOST YOUR EVENT AT PRIVILEGE COCKTAIL LOUNGE
/$
/$
$
$
$
Privilege Cocktail Lounge is the perfect location for your next event!
/$
$
With our prime location in the heart of South Beach, Miami, Privilege
Cocktail
Lounge is an accessible, upscale cocktail lounge nestled in the lobby of the iconic Albion Hotel.
​
Furnished with velvet and leather, Privilege Cocktail Lounge exudes an upscale and chic ambiance, making it an ideal venue for intimate celebrations, corporate events, mixers and more.  Our bar is equipped with a projector and 3 TVs, perfect for screening presentations, sports games, and other media.
W
e love curating bespoke event packages to fit our clients' needs. From bespoke cocktails to customizing the lighting at our bar to suit your theme, we're here to help make your event unforgettable.
​
Ready to plan your event? Please fill out the event form by clicking the link below or email
info@privilegemia.com
with details on how we can make your private event a success
. You'll recieve a response within 48 hours.
/$
$
EVENT FORM
/$
/$
/$
/$

ABOUT
$
$
$
Enjoy the Experience
/$
$
Nestled in the heart of Miami's historic South Beach, Privilege Cocktail Lounge is an upscale cocktail bar located in the lobby of the iconic Albion Hotel.
Combining a welcoming ambiance with a world-class selection of spirits, we're proud to offer a welcoming experience for Miami-based professionals, visitors to Magic City and socialites alike. Whether you're looking to network, enjoy crafted cocktails or spend quality time with friends, Privilege Cocktail Lounge is the premier destination in South Beach.

Phone: (305) 913-1025
​
Open 2pm to 1am Daily
